price: 4. Diggah nanu korosuh, silsilootay ibitte keenik edde debraanaa kee, ogoogay fillittee kee gaboobi ittat keenik edde yaxeenii kee, saqiir deqsitta giráy ken carrisa keenih massosne.
arabic: إِنَّآ أَعۡتَدۡنَا لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ سَلَٰسِلَاْ وَأَغۡلَٰلٗا وَسَعِيرًا

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā aʿtadnā lil'kāfirīna salāsilā wa-aghlālan wasaʿīran
